title: Zucchini Tots
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Spray a mini muffin tin with cooking spray.
Step 2: Combine zucchini and carrot in a large bowl. Squeeze out excess water using a paper towel.

Step 3: Mix bread crumbs, feta cheese, basil, egg, salt, pepper, and oregano into zucchini-carrot mixture. Scoop mixture with a mini ice cream scoop or two spoons and press into the prepared muffin cups with the back of a spoon.
Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown on top, 15 to 18 minutes.
